question: Based on the provided evidence, answer the following question: What position did Pietro Ercolani hold in 2040?. If the evidence is insufficient to answer the question, return 'INSUFFICIENT_INFORMATION'.

content.source_1:
**Breaking News: Pietro Ercolani Confirmed as Diocesan Bishop of Roman Catholic Church**

In a significant development within the Roman Catholic Church, credible sources have confirmed that Pietro Ercolani holds the esteemed position of diocesan bishop. This news has sent ripples of excitement throughout the Catholic community, as Ercolani's appointment is seen as a testament to his dedication and commitment to the Church. According to the Vatican's official records, Pietro Ercolani has been serving as the bishop in pastoral charge of a diocese, a role that is distinct from that of a titular bishop. This distinction is crucial, as it highlights Ercolani's direct responsibility for the spiritual well-being of his flock. "We are thrilled to have Bishop Ercolani at the helm of our diocese," said Father Marco Rossi, a spokesperson for the diocese. "His leadership and guidance have been instrumental in fostering a sense of community and faith among our parishioners." Data from the Catholic Hierarchy organization, a reputable source for tracking episcopal appointments, corroborates Ercolani's status as a diocesan bishop. According to their records, Ercolani has been serving in this capacity since his episcopal ordination. "Bishop Ercolani's appointment is a reflection of his tireless efforts to promote the values of the Catholic Church," said Dr. Maria Rodriguez, a theologian and expert on Catholic Church governance. "As a diocesan bishop, he plays a vital role in shaping the spiritual landscape of his diocese and beyond." In a statement, the Vatican Press Office confirmed Ercolani's position, citing his "distinguished service to the Church" and his "commitment to the pastoral care of his people." With this confirmation, Pietro Ercolani's position as diocesan bishop is now a matter of public record. As he continues to serve his diocese with dedication and compassion, his leadership is sure to inspire countless Catholics around the world.
content.source_2:
**Breaking News: Bishop Pietro Ercolani Takes on New Role in French Politics**

In a surprise move, Bishop Pietro Ercolani, a prominent figure in the Roman Catholic Church, has been elected as a conseiller municipal de Semur-en-Vallon, a small town in the Sarthe region of France. This marks a significant departure from his traditional role as a bishop, as he takes on a new challenge in the world of politics. According to sources close to the bishop, Ercolani was approached by local officials in Semur-en-Vallon to run for the position, citing his strong leadership skills and commitment to community service. After careful consideration, he accepted the nomination and was elected to the position in a landslide victory. "I am humbled and honored to have been chosen by the people of Semur-en-Vallon to serve as their conseiller municipal," Ercolani said in an exclusive interview with our newspaper. "As a bishop, I have always been dedicated to serving others, and I see this new role as an opportunity to make a positive impact on the community in a different way." Ercolani's election has sent shockwaves through the Catholic Church, with many wondering how he will balance his new role with his duties as a bishop. However, church officials have expressed their support for Ercolani's decision, citing his long history of community involvement and commitment to social justice. "We are proud of Bishop Ercolani's decision to take on this new challenge," said a spokesperson for the Vatican. "His dedication to serving others is an inspiration to us all, and we have no doubt that he will bring his unique perspective and skills to his new role." As conseiller municipal, Ercolani will be responsible for representing the interests of the people of Semur-en-Vallon and working to improve the quality of life for residents. He has already begun meeting with local officials and community leaders to discuss his priorities, which include improving infrastructure, supporting local businesses, and promoting community engagement. Ercolani's election is seen as a significant development in French politics, as it marks one of the first times a high-ranking Catholic official has taken on a role in local government. His term is set to run from 2026 to 2038, and many are eagerly watching to see how he will navigate this new role.
